name: RealtimeBoard
tag_list: whiteboard, teamwork, browser-based-app, design, project-management, creative, collaboration, visual, brainstorm, business-model
overview:
RealtimeBoard is a browser-based white board that helps you and others collaborate in a very open environment.

Instead of the limiting framework like in Google Docs, you can use this to do almost anything while working on your ideas, concepts, design, project management. Draw, make sticky notes, write text, upload PDF files either from your device or using Google Drive.

The app also has some templates that will help you get started. For example, there is a template designed to help you make a business model, calendar. The latter is useful for planning your day with a team of people. Having templates helps get you started.

It’s being used by designers and creatives, project managers, architects who work in team.

Features: — White board offers almost limitless options — Collaborate with others in real time — Mini-chats to leave comments and share views — Create your own designs with drawings, sticky notes, PDF files and more — Integrates with Google Drive — Use templates to get started

The tool is available for free at realtimeboard.com. Sign up with Facebook/Google+ account, or email.
